EmailTemplate.name: Unlock Change Rejection
EmailTemplate.subject: {!ACE_Customer_Price_Changes__c.Name}: Unlock Customer Record â€“ Request Rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ACE_Customer_Price_Changes__c.Account_Owner_Name__c},
Your Unlock request on {!ACE_Customer_Price_Changes__c.L1_Mgr_Approval_Start_Date__c} for {!ACE_Customer_Price_Changes__c.Customer_Name__c}, customer number {!ACE_Customer_Price_Changes__c.Owning_Customer_ID__c}, was rejected.
For more information, please refer to Salesforce.com.
https://officedepot.my.salesforce.com/{!ACE_Customer_Price_Changes__c.Id}
Thank you!
